channel.title: canvas on My personal website
channel.description: Recent content in canvas on My personal website

item.title: Serve only some files by exension
item.description: Often I manage websites that use bower as package manager and I don’t want to grant the access to all the packages installed, so I have to filter the file served by nginx.

item.title: An emulator of Pdp8 written in Javascript
item.description: I wrote a new emulator for Pdp8 in Javascript to make it more portable and here you can see the result.

item.title: A cardioid from light reflection
item.description: This is a small experiment using HTML5 canvas and javascript. The module created allows you to plot a cardioid on a canvas starting from the reflection of a ray of light in a circumference.

item.title: Behind the scenes with threejs
item.description: Here we have 4 polygons. The lonely one in the first row is a cube with 6 square faces.
